ground_truth_reviews.comment: The fee calculation logic correctly implements the tiered percentage rates but omits the business requirement for a minimum fee. According to the specification, all transactions must have a minimum fee of $0.50, which is not being enforced here. For small transaction amounts, this will result in under-charging.

title: feat: Implement transaction fee calculation
body: Adds a new method to the PostService for calculating transaction fees based on the provided tiered pricing model. This will be used in upcoming features related to paid posts. See https://github.com/Reviewate/benchmark/issues/68
